Our drive to evolve our services led us to the creation of our very own shipment platform, ACBInsight, that provides full visibility and live data on every step of your order, at a moment’s notice. Not only does it provide 24/7 access to your shipping information, but you can chat directly with a Concierge Agent and upload pertinent documents directly from your computer.

About Us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”GothamBook||||||||” text_text_color=”#303030″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ACB was founded by Juan Jose Rodriguez and is now in the caring and capable hands of his sons Gabriel and Fernando Rodriguez who serve as President and Vice President respectively.

They continue the vision of their father to make ACB more than just a company with employees but a family which they rely on to be an extension of themselves.

excerpt.rendered: YOUR CARGO CONCIERGE ®Experience & Integrity in Logistic SolutionsProviding experience and integrity in client focused logistics solutions that enable peace of mind.Bridging Oceans, Bringing WaterWe are proud to be Water For All partners by donating a percentage every shipment towards BLUE Missions’ work to ensure clean water for all and forever.Our ServicesOur services are centered […]
